t: Amazon Puts Its Own “Brands” First Above Better-Rated Products – The Markup
s: Unable to compete with Amazon on price for brand-name products, Boyce and his brothers launched their own brand, Harvil, in 2007, to sell sporting goods and home recreation equipment on Amazon.

t: 5 Chic Home Brands You Should Be Shopping on Amazon
s: While Amazon is a great place to buy most things (really, what don’t they sell?), it’s probably one of the last places many of us think to buy furniture and décor. It’s not for lack of choice. But actually, the selection of home brands on Amazon is almost too good.
